SELECT BC.EXT1 , BC.CB_IDX , BC.BC_IDX , BC.SUB_CONT , BC.CLOB_CONT_SEARCH , M_LINK_CONT, THUMNAIL_CONT, CF.FILE_STRE_COURS , CF.STRE_FILE_NM , CAPTION_CONT, TO_CHAR(BC.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT WHERE CB_IDX in ('63','64','65','66','67') ORDER BY REG_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM<=1 ) BC, (SELECT BC_IDX, CB_IDX, FILE_STRE_COURS, MAX(STRE_FILE_NM) AS STRE_FILE_NM FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE WHERE MC_IDX IS NULL AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_EXTSN IN ('jpg','gif','png','bmp','jpeg') GROUP BY BC_IDX, CB_IDX, FILE_STRE_COURS
) CF WHERE BC.CB_IDX = CF.CB_IDX(+) AND BC.BC_IDX = CF.BC_IDX(+) AND BC.BC_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY BC.REG_DT DESC

SELECT BC_IDX ,CB_IDX ,SUB_CONT , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT , '' as STRE_FILE_NM , '' as CLOB_CONT FROM ( SELECT BC_IDX ,CB_IDX ,SUB_CONT , REG_DT FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT WHERE 1=1 AND CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_DEL_YN = 'N' AND NOTI_YN = 'N' AND OPEN_YN_CONT = '21000200' ORDER BY BC_IDX DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM<=7

SELECT BC_IDX ,CB_IDX ,SUB_CONT , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT , (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A IDX_CONTENT_FILE_001) */ FILE_STRE_COURS||STRE_FILE_NM FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE WHERE BC_IDX=A.BC_IDX AND CB_IDX=A.CB_IDX AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1) as STRE_FILE_NM , REGEXP_REPLACE(CLOB_CONT, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;') AS CLOB_CONT FROM ( SELECT BC_IDX ,CB_IDX ,SUB_CONT , REG_DT , CLOB_CONT FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT WHERE 1=1
AND CB_IDX IN
#{item}

/*selectBoardList*/ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN T.MW_STATUS_CONT = '20000800' AND 0 < ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = T.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = T.BC_IDX ) THEN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(TO_DATE(T.MINWON_DEPT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')+RN),'YYYY.MM.DD') DDATE FROM (SELECT LEVEL RN FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 30 ) WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.MINWON_DEPT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')+RN-1,'D') IN (1,2,3,4,5) AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.MINWON_DEPT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')+RN,'YYYYMMDD') <> ALL (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(HOL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMMDD') AS SDATE FROM EZ_HOLIDAY WHERE 1 = 1 ) AND ROWNUM <= CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T.MINWON_DEPT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'HH24') >= '18' THEN 3 ELSE 2 END ) ELSE NULL END AS MC_END_DAY , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = T.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = T.BC_IDX AND TEMP_YN = 'Y' )>0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ANS_DAY_DEPT_YN , CASE WHEN T.MW_STATUS_CONT = '20000800' THEN ( SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MC_DELAY_DAY,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY.MM.DD')) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = T.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = T.BC_IDX ) ELSE NULL END AS MC_DELAY_DAY
, BC_IDX , CB_IDX , PARENT_SEQ , ANSWER_STEP , ANSWER_DEPTH , CATE_CONT , CATE_NAME , SUB_CONT , NAME_CONT , ADDR_CONT , EMAIL_CONT , TEL_CONT , PHONE_CONT , COUNT_CONT , CHARGE_NAME_CONT , CHARGE_TEL_CONT , CLOB_CONT_SEARCH , M_LINK_CONT , THUMNAIL_CONT , SUB_LINK_CONT , OPEN_YN_CONT , ANS_YN_CONT , ANS_COMP_CONT , EXT1 , EXT2 , EXT3 , EXT4 , EXT5 , EXT6 , EXT7 , EXT8 , EXT9 , EXT10 , MW_AD_OPEN_YN , ANS_R_YN , MW_NO_REPLY_YN , MW_STATUS_CONT , NOTI_YN , APPR_YN , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT , REG_ID , DUPCODE , FILE_YN , LIST_IMG , SHORT_CUT FROM ( SELECT BC_IDX , CB_IDX
, PARENT_SEQ , ANSWER_STEP , ANSWER_DEPTH , CATE_CONT , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM EZ_CMM_CODE AA WHERE AA.CODE = BC.CATE_CONT ) AS CATE_NAME , SUB_CONT
, REPLACE(NAME_CONT,SUBSTR(NAME_CONT,2),'OO') AS NAME_CONT
, NAME_CONT
, ADDR_CONT , EMAIL_CONT , TEL_CONT , PHONE_CONT , COUNT_CONT , CHARGE_NAME_CONT , CHARGE_TEL_CONT , CLOB_CONT_SEARCH , M_LINK_CONT , THUMNAIL_CONT , SUB_LINK_CONT , CASE WHEN MW_AD_OPEN_YN = 'Y' THEN 'AD_Y' ELSE OPEN_YN_CONT END OPEN_YN_CONT , ANS_YN_CONT , ANS_COMP_CONT , EXT1 , EXT2 , EXT3 , EXT4 , EXT5 , EXT6 , EXT7 , EXT8 , EXT9 , EXT10
, MW_AD_OPEN_YN , ANS_R_YN , MW_NO_REPLY_YN , CASE WHEN ANS_YN_CONT = '22000200' THEN '22000200' WHEN 0 < ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = BC.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = BC.BC_IDX AND CMR.AUDIT_YN IN ('27000100','27000200','27000300') ) THEN '20000500' WHEN 1 = ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = BC.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = BC.BC_IDX ) AND 1 = ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = BC.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = BC.BC_IDX AND CMR.TEMP_YN = 'Y' ) THEN '20000500' ELSE '20000800' END AS MW_STATUS_CONT , (SELECT MIN(REG_DT) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = BC.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = BC.BC_IDX) AS MINWON_DEPT_DT , NOTI_YN , APPR_YN , REG_DT , REG_ID , DUPCODE , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(FILE_NO) FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE CF WHERE CF.CB_IDX = BC.CB_IDX AND CF.BC_IDX = BC.BC_IDX) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS FILE_YN , CASE WHEN #{bbsTempletGbn} IN ('16050200','16050300') THEN (SELECT FILE_STRE_COURS||STRE_FILE_NM FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE CF WHERE CF.CB_IDX = BC.CB_IDX AND CF.BC_IDX = BC.BC_IDX AND FILE_EXTSN IN('png','bmp','jpg','jpeg') AND CF.USE_YN='Y' AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) END LIST_IMG , SHORT_CUT FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT BC WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_DEL_YN = 'N'
AND APPR_YN = 'Y'
AND NAME_CONT = #{deptCodeName}
AND PLACE_TYPE IN ('Y', 'B')
ORDER BY NOTI_YN DESC , PARENT_SEQ DESC , ANSWER_STEP ASC , ANSWER_DEPTH ASC )T )A
mapper.select: SELECT LABEL_NAME , LABEL_PROP_GBN , CONTENT_MAPPING , CONTENT_MAPPING_L , LABEL_COMP_YN , ITEM_CODE FROM EZ_BBS_CONFIG_PROPERTY WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND CONTENT_MAPPING NOT IN('COUNT_CONT','REG_DT','NO_CONT','MW_STATUS_CONT','CHARGE_NAME_CONT','CHARGE_TEL_CONT') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(LABEL_ORD_NO)

SELECT A.CB_IDX , A.CB_NAME , A.CB_UPR_CD , B.BBS_TEMPLET_GBN , B.BBS_APPR_YN , B.CATEGORY_USE_YN , B.M_LIST_YN , B.EDITOR_YN , B.BBS_FILE_CNT , B.ANONYMITY_YN , B.FILE_MAXSIZE , B.PAGE_COUNT AS PAGE_UNIT , C.LIST_GBN , C.READ_GBN , C.WRITE_GBN , C.MOD_GBN , C.DEL_GBN , C.ANSWER_GBN , B.COMMENT_YN , B.SOCIAL_YN FROM EZ_CMS_BBS A , EZ_BBS_CONFIG B , EZ_BBS_USR_CONFIG C WHERE A.CB_IDX = B.CB_IDX(+) AND A.CB_IDX = C.CB_IDX(+) AND A.CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CB_USE = 'Y'

SELECT BBS_TEMPLET_GBN , CONTENT_MAPPING , LABEL_NAME , LABEL_PROP_GBN , ITEM_CODE , PARENT_SEQ , ANSWER_DEPTH , CASE WHEN ITEM_CODE IS NOT NULL AND CONTENT_MAPPING NOT IN('OPEN_YN_CONT','ANS_YN_CONT','ANS_COMP_CONT','MW_STATUS_CONT') THEN (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE = DATA_CONTENT) ELSE DATA_CONTENT END AS DATA_CONTENT , CLOB_CONT , CAPTION_CONT , REG_ID , DUPCODE , OPEN_YN_CONT , CLOB_CONT2 , MW_STATUS_CONT , GUB_PASSWORD FROM ( SELECT (SELECT BBS_TEMPLET_GBN FROM EZ_BBS_CONFIG WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx}) AS BBS_TEMPLET_GBN , AA.CONTENT_MAPPING , AA.LABEL_NAME , AA.LABEL_PROP_GBN , AA.ITEM_CODE , PARENT_SEQ , ANSWER_DEPTH , CASE CONTENT_MAPPING
WHEN 'CATE_CONT' THEN CATE_CONT WHEN 'SUB_CONT' THEN SUB_CONT
WHEN 'NAME_CONT' THEN REPLACE(NAME_CONT,SUBSTR(NAME_CONT,2),'OO')
WHEN 'NAME_CONT' THEN NAME_CONT
WHEN 'ADDR_CONT' THEN ADDR_CONT WHEN 'EMAIL_CONT' THEN EMAIL_CONT WHEN 'TEL_CONT' THEN TEL_CONT WHEN 'PHONE_CONT' THEN PHONE_CONT WHEN 'REG_DT' THEN REG_DT WHEN 'COUNT_CONT' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT_CONT) WHEN 'CHARGE_NAME_CONT' THEN CHARGE_NAME_CONT WHEN 'CHARGE_TEL_CONT' THEN CHARGE_TEL_CONT WHEN 'CLOB_CONT' THEN 'CLOB_CONT' WHEN 'CAPTION_CONT' THEN 'CAPTION_CONT' WHEN 'M_LINK_CONT' THEN M_LINK_CONT
WHEN 'SUB_LINK_CONT' THEN SUB_LINK_CONT WHEN 'ANS_YN_CONT' THEN ANS_YN_CONT
WHEN 'OPEN_YN_CONT' THEN OPEN_YN_CONT WHEN 'ANS_COMP_CONT' THEN ANS_COMP_CONT WHEN 'EXT1' THEN EXT1 WHEN 'EXT2' THEN EXT2 WHEN 'EXT3' THEN EXT3 WHEN 'EXT4' THEN EXT4 WHEN 'EXT5' THEN EXT5 WHEN 'EXT6' THEN EXT6 WHEN 'EXT7' THEN EXT7 WHEN 'EXT8' THEN EXT8 WHEN 'EXT9' THEN EXT9 WHEN 'EXT10' THEN EXT10
WHEN 'MW_AD_OPEN_YN' THEN MW_AD_OPEN_YN WHEN 'ANS_R_YN' THEN ANS_R_YN WHEN 'MW_NO_REPLY_YN' THEN MW_NO_REPLY_YN WHEN 'MW_STATUS_CONT' THEN MW_STATUS_CONT WHEN 'NOTI_YN' THEN NOTI_YN WHEN 'APPR_YN' THEN APPR_YN WHEN 'REG_ID' THEN REG_ID WHEN 'CD_SUBJECT' THEN CD_SUBJECT WHEN 'CLOB_CONT2' THEN 'CLOB_CONT2' WHEN 'GUB_PASSWORD' THEN GUB_PASSWORD END AS DATA_CONTENT , MW_STATUS_CONT , CLOB_CONT , CAPTION_CONT , REG_ID , DUPCODE , OPEN_YN_CONT , CLOB_CONT2 , GUB_PASSWORD FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.MW_STATUS_CONT = '20000800' AND 0 < ( SELECT COUNT(MC_IDX) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX ) THEN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(TO_DATE(A.MINWON_DEPT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')+RN),'YYYY.MM.DD') DDATE FROM (SELECT LEVEL RN FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 30 ) WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINWON_DEPT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')+RN-1,'D') IN (1,2,3,4,5) AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINWON_DEPT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')+RN,'YYYYMMDD') <> ALL (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(HOL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYYMMDD') AS SDATE FROM EZ_HOLIDAY WHERE 1 = 1 ) AND ROWNUM <= CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINWON_DEPT_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'HH24') >= '18' THEN 3 ELSE 2 END ) ELSE NULL END AS MC_END_DAY , CASE WHEN A.MW_STATUS_CONT = '20000800' THEN ( SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MC_DELAY_DAY,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY.MM.DD')) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX ) ELSE NULL END AS MC_DELAY_DAY , A.* FROM ( SELECT BC_IDX , CB_IDX
, PARENT_SEQ , ANSWER_STEP , ANSWER_DEPTH , CATE_CONT , SUB_CONT , NAME_CONT
, ADDR_CONT , EMAIL_CONT , TEL_CONT , PHONE_CONT , COUNT_CONT , CHARGE_NAME_CONT , CHARGE_TEL_CONT , CLOB_CONT , CAPTION_CONT , M_LINK_CONT , THUMNAIL_CONT , SUB_LINK_CONT , CASE WHEN MW_AD_OPEN_YN = 'Y' THEN 'AD_Y' ELSE OPEN_YN_CONT END OPEN_YN_CONT , ANS_YN_CONT , ANS_COMP_CONT , EXT1 , EXT2 , EXT3 , EXT4 , EXT5 , EXT6 , EXT7 , EXT8 , EXT9 , EXT10
, MW_AD_OPEN_YN , ANS_R_YN , MW_NO_REPLY_YN , MW_STATUS_CONT , (SELECT MIN(REG_DT) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT CMR WHERE CMR.CB_IDX = T.CB_IDX AND CMR.BC_IDX = T.BC_IDX) AS MINWON_DEPT_DT , NOTI_YN , APPR_YN , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT , REG_ID , DUPCODE , CASE WHEN (SELECT FILE_NO FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE WHERE CB_IDX = T.CB_IDX AND BC_IDX = T.BC_IDX AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS FILE_YN , CASE WHEN #{bbsTempletGbn} IN ('16050200','16050300') THEN (SELECT FILE_STRE_COURS||STRE_FILE_NM FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE WHERE CB_IDX = T.CB_IDX AND BC_IDX = T.BC_IDX AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_EXTSN IN('png','bmp','jpg','jpeg','gif') AND EZ_CONTENT_FILE.USE_YN='Y' AND ROWNUM <= 1 ) END LIST_IMG , CD_SUBJECT , CLOB_CONT2 , GUB_PASSWORD FROM ( SELECT * FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx} AND BC_DEL_YN = 'N' )T )A ) ) X , ( SELECT CONTENT_MAPPING , LABEL_NAME , LABEL_PROP_GBN , ITEM_CODE FROM EZ_BBS_CONFIG_PROPERTY WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND CONTENT_MAPPING NOT IN ('NO_CONT','THUMNAIL_CONT') AND VIEW_USE_YN = 'Y'
AND CONTENT_MAPPING NOT IN ('ADDR_CONT','EMAIL_CONT','TEL_CONT','PHONE_CONT','OPEN_YN_CONT','ANS_YN_CONT','ANS_COMP_CONT')
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(LABEL_ORD_NO) ) AA )

/*selectBoardPrevNext*/ SELECT BC_IDX , PREV_IDX , PREV_SUB , PREV_REGDT , PREV_SHORT_CUT , NEXT_IDX , NEXT_SUB , NEXT_REGDT , NEXT_SHORT_CUT FROM ( SELECT BC_IDX , LAG(BC_IDX, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NO_CONT) PREV_IDX , LAG(SUB_CONT, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NO_CONT) PREV_SUB , LAG(REG_DT, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NO_CONT) PREV_REGDT , LAG(SHORT_CUT, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NO_CONT) PREV_SHORT_CUT , LEAD(BC_IDX, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NO_CONT) NEXT_IDX , LEAD(SUB_CONT, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NO_CONT) NEXT_SUB , LEAD(REG_DT, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NO_CONT) NEXT_REGDT , LEAD(SHORT_CUT, 1) OVER(ORDER BY NO_CONT) NEXT_SHORT_CUT FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX(A IDX_BBS_PREV_NEXT) */ A.* , ROWNUM AS NO_CONT FROM (
WHERE 1=1 AND NOTI_YN>' ' )A WHERE OPEN_YN_CONT IS NULL OR OPEN_YN_CONT = '21000200' AND ANSWER_DEPTH = 0 ) ) WHERE BC_IDX = #{bcIdx}

SELECT BC_IDX , CB_IDX
, PARENT_SEQ , ANSWER_STEP , ANSWER_DEPTH
, CATE_CONT , SUB_CONT , NAME_CONT
, ADDR_CONT , EMAIL_CONT , TEL_CONT , PHONE_CONT
, COUNT_CONT , CLOB_CONT , M_LINK_CONT , THUMNAIL_CONT , SUB_LINK_CONT , OPEN_YN_CONT , ANS_YN_CONT , ANS_COMP_CONT , EXT1 , EXT2 , EXT3 , EXT4 , EXT5 , EXT6 , EXT7 , EXT8 , EXT9 , EXT10
, MW_AD_OPEN_YN , ANS_R_YN , MW_NO_REPLY_YN , MW_STATUS_CONT , NOTI_YN , APPR_YN , REG_DT , REG_ID , DUPCODE , MOD_DT , MOD_ID , BC_DEL_YN , CHARGE_NAME_CONT , CHARGE_TEL_CONT , CLOB_CONT2 , GUB_PASSWORD FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx} AND APPR_YN = 'Y' AND BC_DEL_YN <> 'Y'
AND DUPCODE = #{dupcode}
SELECT ANS_YN_CONT , ANS_R_YN , CHARGE_NAME_CONT , CHARGE_TEL_CONT , ANS_WRITER , ANS_DT , ANS_CONTENT FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx}
SELECT CODE AS CATEGORY_CODE , CODE_NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE_UPR = (SELECT ITEM_CODE FROM EZ_BBS_CONFIG_PROPERTY WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND CONTENT_MAPPING = 'CATE_CONT')
SELECT CONTENT_MAPPING , LABEL_NAME FROM EZ_BBS_CONFIG_PROPERTY WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND SEARCH_LABEL_USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT NVL(MAX(BC_IDX), 0) + 1 AS BC_IDX FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT

SELECT BC_IDX , CB_IDX , FILE_NO , FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM , ORIGNL_FILE_NM , FILE_EXTSN , FILE_CN , TRUNC(FILE_SIZE / 1048576,1) AS FILE_SIZE , MC_IDX FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND MC_IDX IS NOT NULL
AND MC_IDX IS NULL
AND FILE_EXTSN IN('png','bmp','jpg','jpeg','gif')

SELECT BC_IDX , CB_IDX , FILE_NO , MC_IDX , FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM , ORIGNL_FILE_NM , FILE_EXTSN , FILE_CN , FILE_SIZE FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
AND MC_IDX = #{mcIdx}

SELECT MC_IDX , BC_IDX , MC_TITLE , (SELECT CD_SUBJECT FROM EZ_DEPARTMENT WHERE CD_IDX = MC_DEPT_CD) , MC_DEPT_CD , MC_DEPT_NO1_CD , MC_DEPT_HIST , MC_REPLYER , MC_TEL1 , MC_TEL2 , MC_MSG , MC_UNIT_CD , MC_AREA_CD , MC_FILED_CD , MC_KD_CD , MC_RESULT , MC_POINT_TXT , MC_DELAY_DAY , MC_DELAY_RSN , MC_STATUS , AUDIT_YN , MC_B_SENDER , MC_B_MTH , MC_B_DAY , MC_B_TXT , MC_A_SENDER , MC_A_MTH , MC_A_DAY , MC_A_TXT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID , CB_IDX , CONTENT_CLOB , CATEGORY FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx}

SELECT MC_IDX , BC_IDX , CB_IDX , MC_POINT_TXT , CONTENT_CLOB , (SELECT CD_SUBJECT FROM EZ_DEPARTMENT WHERE CD_IDX = MC_DEPT_CD) MC_DEPT_CD , MC_REPLYER , MC_TEL1 , (SELECT MAX(SUB_CONT) FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT BC WHERE BC.CB_IDX = CB_IDX AND BC.BC_IDX = BC_IDX) AS SUB_CONT , MC_SURVEY , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REG_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DT , REG_ID , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MOD_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY') AS MOD_DT1 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'MM') AS MOD_DT2 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'DD') AS MOD_DT3 , (SELECT DUPCODE FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT BC WHERE BC.CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC.BC_IDX = #{bcIdx}) AS DUPCODE FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx}
ORDER BY MOD_DT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx}
SELECT CODE , CODE_NAME , CODE_UPR FROM EZ_CMM_CODE WHERE CODE_UPR = #{itemCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ORD_NO
SELECT MAX(CB_NAME) AS CODE_NAME FROM EZ_CMS_BBS WHERE CB_CD = #{deptCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BC_IDX , CB_IDX , ORIGNL_FILE_NM , STRE_FILE_NM , USE_YN , FILE_EXTSN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY BC_IDX,CB_IDX ORDER BY FILE_NO DESC) AS FILE_CNT FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE A WHERE CB_IDX =#{cbIdx} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM EZ_BBS_CONTENT WHERE BC_DEL_YN = 'N' AND CB_IDX = A.CB_IDX AND BC_IDX = A.BC_IDX)
AND Bc_IDX IN
#{item}
ORDER BY BC_IDX DESC) WHERE FILE_CNT <= 2
SELECT RSS_USE_YN FROM EZ_BBS_CONFIG WHERE CB_IDX = #{cbIdx}
